property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, or when it attacks, both players reveal the top card of their decks. If the opponent's card is a spell, cast it for no cost and put it into his graveyard. Then, if your card is a spell, you may cast it for no cost. For each non-spell revealed this way, you may draw a card. Triple breaker
